TopicTitle: Does mods automatically work in career mode?

Articles.Content: For example FAR. Will it just apply correctly to career mode games? And what about mods that adds parts? I have looked in the cfg's and I can't really seem to figure out what determines a parts placement in the tech tree.

If there are lines with

TechRequired =

entryCost =

then it will be in tech tree. Partless mods work automagically (Chatterer). ModManager and, therefor, FAR should work too.
